languages.text: "Твое тщеславие перешло границу, отделяющую глупость от святотатства". {n}Хейнрикс сжимает кулаки. На мгновение вам кажется, что воздух начал холодеть... однако через секунду иллюзия рассеивается.{/n}

"Your vanity has crossed the line that divides stupidity from blasphemy." {n}Heinrix clenches his fists. For a moment, you feel as if the air is going cold... but the illusion is dispelled a mere second later.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Твое тщеславие перешло границу, отделяющую глупость от святотатства". {n}Хейнрикс сжимает кулаки. На мгновение вам кажется, что воздух начал холодеть... однако через секунду иллюзия рассеивается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Your vanity has crossed the line that divides stupidity from blasphemy." {n}Heinrix clenches his fists. For a moment there, you feel as if the air is going cold... but that illusion is dispelled a mere second later.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your vanity has crossed the line that divides stupidity from blasphemy." {n}Heinrix clenches his fists. For a moment, you feel as if the air is going cold... but the illusion is dispelled a mere second later.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “你的虚荣心已经超过了愚蠢的界限，快要越过亵渎的边界了。”{n}海因里希握紧了拳头。有那么一瞬间，你感觉空气正在不断变冷……但仅仅过了一秒钟之后，这样的感觉就消失了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your vanity has crossed the line that divides stupidity from blasphemy." {n}Heinrix clenches his fists. For a moment, you feel as if the air is going cold... but the illusion is dispelled a mere second later.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你的虚荣心已经超过了愚蠢的界限，快要越过亵渎的边界了。”{n}海因里希握紧了拳头。有那么一瞬间，你感觉空气正在不断变冷……但仅仅过了一秒钟之后，这样的感觉就消失了。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「そのうぬぼれ、愚かさと冒涜の一線を越えていますね」{n}ハインリックスは拳を握った。一瞬、空気が冷たくなったように感じたが…その錯覚は一瞬で消えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your vanity has crossed the line that divides stupidity from blasphemy." {n}Heinrix clenches his fists. For a moment, you feel as if the air is going cold... but the illusion is dispelled a mere second later.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そのうぬぼれ、愚かさと冒涜の一線を越えていますね」{n}ハインリックスは拳を握った。一瞬、空気が冷たくなったように感じたが…その錯覚は一瞬で消えた。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Su vanidad ha cruzado la línea que divide la estupidez de la blasfemia». {n}Heinrix aprieta los puños. Por un momento, sientes como si el aire se enfriara... pero esa ilusión se disipa apenas un segundo después.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your vanity has crossed the line that divides stupidity from blasphemy." {n}Heinrix clenches his fists. For a moment, you feel as if the air is going cold... but the illusion is dispelled a mere second later.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Su vanidad ha cruzado la línea que divide la estupidez de la blasfemia». {n}Heinrix aprieta los puños. Por un momento, sientes como si el aire se enfriara... pero esa ilusión se disipa apenas un segundo después.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Eure Eitelkeit hat die Grenze zwischen Dummheit und Blasphemie überquert." {n}Heinrix ballt die Fäuste. Einen Augenblick lang fühlt es sich an, als würde die Luft kalt werden ... doch die Illusion verschwindet schon eine Sekunde später wieder.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your vanity has crossed the line that divides stupidity from blasphemy." {n}Heinrix clenches his fists. For a moment, you feel as if the air is going cold... but the illusion is dispelled a mere second later.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eure Eitelkeit hat die Grenze zwischen Dummheit und Blasphemie überquert." {n}Heinrix ballt die Fäuste. Einen Augenblick lang fühlt es sich an, als würde die Luft kalt werden ... doch diese Illusion verschwindet schon eine Sekunde später wieder.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Votre vanité a franchi la ligne qui sépare la bêtise du blasphème. » {n}Heinrix serre les poings. L'espace d'un instant, vous avez l'impression que l'air se refroidit... mais c'est une illusion qui se dissipe presque immédiatement.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your vanity has crossed the line that divides stupidity from blasphemy." {n}Heinrix clenches his fists. For a moment, you feel as if the air is going cold... but the illusion is dispelled a mere second later.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Votre vanité a franchi la ligne qui sépare la bêtise du blasphème. » {n}Heinrix serre les poings. L'espace d'un instant, vous avez l'impression que l'air se refroidit... mais c'est une illusion qui se dissipe presque immédiatement.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Kibrin, aptallığı dine aykırılıktan ayıran çizgiyi aşıyor." {n}Heinrix yumruklarını sıkıyor. Bir an için hava serinler gibi oluyor... Fakat bu sanrı çabucak kayboluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your vanity has crossed the line that divides stupidity from blasphemy." {n}Heinrix clenches his fists. For a moment, you feel as if the air is going cold... but the illusion is dispelled a mere second later.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kibrin, aptallığı günahkârlıktan ayıran çizgiyi aşıyor." {n}Heinrix yumruklarını sıkıyor. Bir an için hava serinler gibi oluyor... ama bu sanrı çabucak kayboluyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
